languages.text: {n}При взгляде на искалеченный аугмент Паскаль страдальчески морщится.{/n} "Фиксирую доказательства неприемлемых условий эксплуатации драгоценной Истинной плоти. Маркировка указывает, что данный священный металл был изготовлен много веков назад на благословенном Марсе, и столь грубое и небрежное его использование оскорбляет Омниссию".

{n}The sight of the mangled augmetic elicits a pained grimace from Pasqal.{/n} "I am registering evidence of precious True Flesh being operated in unacceptable conditions. The markings indicate that this sacred metal was fashioned many centuries ago on blessed Mars. Putting it to such crude and careless use is an insult to the Omnissiah."
languages.original_text: {n}При взгляде на искалеченный аугмент Паскаль страдальчески морщится.{/n} "Фиксирую доказательства неприемлемых условий эксплуатации драгоценной Истинной плоти. Маркировка указывает, что данный священный металл был изготовлен много веков назад на благословенном Марсе, и столь грубое и небрежное его использование оскорбляет Омниссию".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sight of the mangled augmetic elicits a pained grimace from Pasqal.{/n} "I am recording evidence of precious True Flesh being operated in unacceptable working conditions. The markings indicate that this sacred metal was fashioned many centuries ago on blessed Mars. Putting it to such vulgar and careless use is an insult to the Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}ボロボロのオーグメティックを目にしたパスカルが苦悶の表情を見せる。{/n}「大事な真の肉体が許容しがたい状態で操作されている証拠を記録しています。この聖なる金属は何世紀もの昔、恩寵受けし火星で作られたものと、印がある。それをこんな雑に扱いメンテナンスを怠るとは、万機神への侮辱である」
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the mangled augmetic elicits a pained grimace from Pasqal.{/n} "I am registering evidence of precious True Flesh being operated in unacceptable conditions. The markings indicate that this sacred metal was fashioned many centuries ago on blessed Mars. Putting it to such crude and careless use is an insult to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}ボロボロのオーグメティックを目にしたパスカルが苦悶の表情を見せる。{/n}「大事な真の肉体が許容しがたい状態で操作されている証拠を記録しています。この聖なる金属は何世紀もの昔、恩寵受けし火星で作られたものと、印がある。それをこんな雑に扱いメンテナンスを怠るとは、万機神への侮辱である」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}看到这些残破的植入物之后，帕斯卡露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“检测到宝贵的实肉在不可接受的条件下进行操作。这些标记表明，这块神圣的金属是许多世纪前在神圣的火星上铸造而成。若是像这样粗暴而疏忽地使用它，是对欧姆尼塞亚的侮辱。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the mangled augmetic elicits a pained grimace from Pasqal.{/n} "I am registering evidence of precious True Flesh being operated in unacceptable conditions. The markings indicate that this sacred metal was fashioned many centuries ago on blessed Mars. Putting it to such crude and careless use is an insult to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}看到这些残破的植入物之后，帕斯卡露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}“正在记录宝贵的实肉在不可接受的条件下进行操作的证据。这些标记表明，这块神圣的金属是许多世纪前在神圣的火星上铸造而成。若是像这样粗暴而疏忽地使用它，是对欧姆尼塞亚的侮辱。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ne peut s'empêcher de grimacer à la vue des augmétiques trafiqués.{/n} « Je détecte des traces d'altérations inacceptables de la précieuse chair véritable. Les marques indiquent que ce métal sacré a été forgé il y a des siècles sur Mars la bénie. Le négliger ainsi est une insulte envers l'Omnimessie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the mangled augmetic elicits a pained grimace from Pasqal.{/n} "I am registering evidence of precious True Flesh being operated in unacceptable conditions. The markings indicate that this sacred metal was fashioned many centuries ago on blessed Mars. Putting it to such crude and careless use is an insult to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal ne peut s'empêcher de grimacer à la vue des augmétiques trafiqués.{/n} « Je détecte des traces d'altérations inacceptables de la précieuse chair véritable. Les marques indiquent que ce métal sacré a été forgé il y a des siècles sur Mars la bénie. Le négliger ainsi est une insulte envers l'Omnimessie. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, al ver los destrozados auméticos, realiza una mueca de dolor.{/n} «Registrando pruebas de verdadera carne de gran valor siendo usada en condiciones inaceptables. Las marcas indican que este metal sagrado se forjó hace muchos siglos en el bendito planeta de Marte. Utilizarlo de manera tan burda y descuidada es un agravio contra el Omnissiah».
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the mangled augmetic elicits a pained grimace from Pasqal.{/n} "I am registering evidence of precious True Flesh being operated in unacceptable conditions. The markings indicate that this sacred metal was fashioned many centuries ago on blessed Mars. Putting it to such crude and careless use is an insult to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, al ver los destrozados auméticos, realiza una mueca de dolor.{/n} «Registrando pruebas de verdadera carne de gran valor siendo usada en condiciones inaceptables. Las marcas indican que este metal sagrado se forjó hace muchos siglos en el bendito planeta de Marte. Utilizarlo de manera tan burda y descuidada es un agravio contra el Omnissiah».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bei dem Anblick der verstümmelten Augmentation verzieht Pasqal gepeinigt das Gesicht.{/n} "Ich registriere Beweise für wertvolles Wahres Fleisch, das unter inakzeptablen Bedingungen betrieben wird. Die Markierungen deuten darauf hin, dass dieses heilige Metall vor vielen Jahrhunderten auf dem gesegneten Mars gefertigt wurde. Es auf derart krude und sorglose Weise zu nutzen, ist eine Beleidigung des Omnissiah."
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the mangled augmetic elicits a pained grimace from Pasqal.{/n} "I am registering evidence of precious True Flesh being operated in unacceptable conditions. The markings indicate that this sacred metal was fashioned many centuries ago on blessed Mars. Putting it to such crude and careless use is an insult to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bei dem Anblick der verstümmelten Augmentation verzieht Pasqal gepeinigt das Gesicht.{/n} "Ich registriere Beweise für wertvolles Wahres Fleisch, das unter inakzeptablen Bedingungen betrieben wird. Die Markierungen deuten darauf hin, dass dieses heilige Metall vor vielen Jahrhunderten auf dem gesegneten Mars gefertigt wurde. Es auf derart krude und sorglose Weise zu nutzen, ist eine Beleidigung des Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Biçimi bozulmuş ogmetiğin görüntüsü, Pasqal'ın acıyla yüzünü buruşturmasına neden oluyor.{/n} "Değerli Salt Suret'in kabul edilemez şartlarda işletildiğine dair kanıtları kaydediyorum. Üzerindeki işaretler, bu kutsal metalin birçok yüzyıl önce kutsanmış Mars'ta üretildiğine işaret etmekte. Onu böylesine inceliksizce ve ihmalkârca kullanmak, Hermesih'e hakarettir."
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of the mangled augmetic elicits a pained grimace from Pasqal.{/n} "I am registering evidence of precious True Flesh being operated in unacceptable conditions. The markings indicate that this sacred metal was fashioned many centuries ago on blessed Mars. Putting it to such crude and careless use is an insult to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Biçimi bozulmuş ogmetiğin görüntüsü, Pasqal'ın acıyla yüzünü buruşturmasına neden oluyor.{/n} "Değerli Salt Suret'in kabul edilemez şartlarda işletildiğine dair kanıtlar kaydetmekteyim. Üzerindeki işaretler, bu kutsal metalin birçok yüzyıl önce, kutsanmış Mars'ta üretildiğine işaret etmekte. Onu böylesine inceliksizce ve ihmalkâr bir şekilde kullanmak Hermesih'e bir hakarettir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
